snippet: The two men, in Turkey for the Group of 20 summit meeting, talked for 35 minutes, though a Russian official said they disagreed on how to deal with with the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The two men, in Turkey for the Group of 20 summit meeting, talked for 35 minutes, though a Russian official said they disagreed on how to deal with with the Islamic State.

headline.main: Obama and Putin Discuss ISIS and Syria in Informal Conversation
